greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = 1 if n is divisible by the square of its largest prime factor, 0 otherwise.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
formula: a(n) = 1 if n > 1 and A006530(n)^2 divides n, otherwise 0.
For n > 1, a(n) = A000035(A336124(n)) = A122111(n) mod 2. - _Antti Karttunen_, Jul 18 2020
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 04 2018
